duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching for all store employees.
Maintain high retention by focusing on identifying and developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging productivity.
Oversee and implement all merchandising and marketing programs.
Use P&L and store reports to affect change. Manage cash handling, fuel transactions, and promotion of loyalty programs.
Maintain a clean, safe environment by complying with health and sanitation procedures.
Perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching, and occasionally lifting up to 50 pounds.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred, but not required for candidates with one year of retail management experience.
